title: Witches: Truth Behind the Trials
overview: This exciting six-part series brings the world of so-called witches and witch-hunters vividly to life using cinematic recreations and testimony from the most respected historians and experts working in the field today.  The events surrounding six of the world's worst and most fascinating witch trials are brought thrillingly to life with contemporary interpretation and analysis shedding a fresh light on the reasons for  these terrifying deaths and miscarriages of justice.  With stories from Germany, Scotland, England, Sweden, the USA and Ireland.
